about:
Hello! I am **Smridh Singh**, a recent graduate from University of Waterloo (ON, Canada). Currently seeking a Full-Time position in healthcare-technology sector.


  I am a hard-working candidate who is quick to take initiatives, open to new challenges and strive to deliver to the highest standard. 

I am passionate about healthcare and programming. For me, Coding provides the ability to convert ideas and data into meaningful application for improving population health. I enjoy learning about new technologies and upskill myself. My experience lies in software development, data analytics and Electronic Medical Records (EMRs).
